details.title: System of simulation training for unmanned aircraft
details.abstract: For proficiently operating an unmanned aircraft, the aircrew must be thoroughly trained. However, using practical equipment to train the aircrew is work of high cost and risk. In this paper, a system of simulation training for unmanned aircraft is introduced. Its function and composition are explained in detail. In practice, the system not only decreases training cost and risk, but also strengthens training effectiveness and diversity
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine
